Report Management

</details><MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **1.Enter the value such as:**
          If [   short_code   ] is "FS" then [   foldername   ] is "reports/fraudseer/",  If [   short_code   ] is "CS" then [  foldername   ] is "reports/complianseer/",  If [   short_code   ] is "RS" then [   foldername   ] is "reports/reconseer/",  If [   short_code   ] is "SS" then [   foldername   ] is "reports/strataseer/"
          
          **2.Add [   alert_threshold   ] in the range 0-100 %**
          
          **3.To get [  report_layout_type   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Reports ):
          /codes/get-list-by-type
          (**e.g.**"key": "A", "value": "Account Layout")
          
          **4.For [  column_to_show   ] :**
          If "reportLayoutType":"A" then "column_to_show": "account_holder_id,account_number,account_search_query,account_status_desc,address_1,address_2,age,alert,as_of_date,business_name,card_id,card_number,city,client_id,client_name,configured_transaction_count,country,dob,ds_account_status_code,ds_account_status_desc,ds_card_type_code,ds_card_type_desc,email,first_name,group_desc,group_id,last_name,ledger_balance,phone_1,processor,product_desc,product_id,program_id,program_name,ssn,state,tin,to_as_of_date,total_transaction_amount,total_transaction_count,transaction_search_query,uniqueidentifier,zip"
          
          If "report_layout_type": "T" then "column_to_show": "account_number,account_status_desc,address_1,address_2,age,as_of_date,as_of_time,auth_type_id,auth_type_id_desc,authorization_code,authorization_desc,card_id,card_network,card_number,card_status_desc,cashback_amount,city,country,dob,ds_account_status_code,ds_account_status_desc,ds_authorization_code,ds_authorization_desc,ds_card_status_code,ds_card_status_desc,ds_pos_entry_code,ds_pos_entry_desc,ds_transaction_code,ds_transaction_desc,email,first_name,interchange_fee_amount,international_transaction_indicator_code,international_transaction_indicator_desc,last_name,merchant_address,merchant_category,merchant_category_code,merchant_city,merchant_country,merchant_country_code,merchant_name,merchant_number,merchant_state,merchant_zip,message_type,message_type_desc,network_code,opening_balance,person_id,phone_number,pin_sig_flag,pos_entry_mode,pos_indicator,pos_indicator_desc,post_date,post_time,processor,product_desc,product_id,program_id,program_name,settlement_date,ssn,state,sub_network_code,transaction_amount,transaction_country,transaction_country_code_iso,transaction_currency,transaction_currency_code_iso,transaction_date,transaction_desc,transaction_fee_amount,transaction_id,transaction_time,transaction_type,unique_id,zip"
          
          If  "report_layout_type": "R" then "column_to_show": "balanceamount,count,creditamount,debitamount,netamount,processor,processor_id,program_id,program_name,serial,transaction_group_id,transaction_group_name"
          **Select [  column_to_show   ] value as per requirement**
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"enabled"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"0"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"export_report"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"boolean"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"boolean","default":false}}
        >

          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}

        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"config_code"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"FS789"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"name"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"money theft"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"foldername"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"reports/fraudseer/"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"filesuffix"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"txt"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"min_value"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"0"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"max_value"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"0"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"pattern_value"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"0"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"alert_threshold"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"integer"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"trigger_alerts"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"0"}}

        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}

          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"A"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"column_to_show"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":" "}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"clients_to_show"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string[]"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","default":""}}}

          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}

          schema={{"type":"string","default":" "}}
